13900202102112216519221124291-123 "Yes, yes," said Andres, laughing, and
shaking her 0 trustfully by the hand; "I have won the race, good Mary; 2
I was at the pear-tree and back again seven years ago, 4 and thou,
sluggish creature, art but just
returned!"00202202291022064321016611-1321 14006Johann Ludwig

THE LONG NIGHT OF WAITING0-17
3090020210206221114532211104322161934223522062434221629241-223 "ButI
want himhe" Alex began to cry, not with the loud screaming Lesley had
feared, but in a way now 1 which made her hurt a little inside as she
watched him 2 butt his head against Rick's shoulder, making no effort 3
to smear away the tears as they wet his dirty
cheeks.00202216342422592216432422164314220648219971-624 31002Andre
Norton000202102062206104322111029220229142202341422113414221138297949441-623
